description: Main source file for the Flutter frontend of a bookstore transaction management app, including UI screens, state management, API client, and models.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: Handles HTTP API requests with optional authorization headers, loads base URL from environment variables.

classes.name: TransactionModel
classes.description: Represents a transaction with fields like id, title, amount, date, notes; includes JSON serialization methods.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user authentication state via JWT token, including login and logout functionalities.

classes.name: TransactionsProvider
classes.description: Manages the list of transactions, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting transactions via API.

classes.name: BookstoreApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring theme and initial route.

classes.name: RootGate
classes.description: Determines whether to show login or main app based on authentication state.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app scaffold with bottom navigation for dashboard, add, and profile screens.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Handles user login UI and logic, updates AuthProvider.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays transactions summary, list, refresh, and edit options.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: Shows user profile and logout option.

classes.name: TransactionFormScreen
classes.description: Form for adding or editing a transaction, interacts with TransactionsProvider.

methods.name: ApiClient.get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified API endpoint.

methods.name: ApiClient.post
methods.description: Performs a POST request with optional body and authorization.

methods.name: ApiClient.put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request with optional body and authorization.

methods.name: ApiClient.delete
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified API endpoint.

methods.name: TransactionModel.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a TransactionModel from JSON data.

methods.name: AuthProvider.login
methods.description: Authenticates user against API and stores JWT on success.

methods.name: AuthProvider.logout
methods.description: Clears authentication tokens and resets state.

methods.name: TransactionsProvider.fetchAll
methods.description: Fetches all transactions from backend API.

methods.name: TransactionsProvider.create
methods.description: Creates a new transaction via API.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point: loads environment, initializes shared preferences, sets up providers, runs the app.
